resources.string:
Drive & Draw is an App for Sphero which allows you to control your Sphero Robot.
The movements of Sphero are drawn on a surface. This allows you to create a 2D-Map of a surface.
The feature for collisiondetection can be used for an authentic creation of the 2D-Map.
The drawing and Spheros LED can be customized with an included color picker.
Please report any issues or suggestion at the following address:
irtaza.com@gmail.com
